sect2.title: zSeries and System z machine types
sect2.para:
The minimum required z/Architecture processor type is z196.
The most current information about IBM's Linux support can be found at the
Linux on System z page on developerWorks.

sect2.title: PAV and HyperPAV
sect2.para: PAV and HyperPAV are supported transparently, multipathing is not needed to take advantage of these storage system features. Be sure to configure the devices during DASD device selection. The alias devices will not be offered neither for formatting, partitioning nor direct use.
